content.heroIntro:
Welcome to VILLA TEGI, an exclusive residential development in El Chaparral, Torrevieja, brought to you by the trusted developer DK TILL SPANIEN. This contemporary villa community offers 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom homes with a built area of 167m² on generous 930m² plots, starting from €895,000. Each villa is meticulously designed with modern finishes, private gardens, and optional swimming pools, representing outstanding value in one of Spain's most desirable coastal locations.

Torrevieja is home to Spain's largest and most welcoming expat community, where English is spoken everywhere and a vibrant international lifestyle awaits. VILLA TEGI combines the tranquility of a private residential setting with immediate access to world-class amenities: pristine Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and cosmopolitan dining and shopping options.

With delivery scheduled for November 1st, 2026, VILLA TEGI offers international buyers a rare opportunity to invest in premium Spanish real estate that combines lifestyle, location, and long-term value appreciation. Property values in Torrevieja are rising at 8% year-on-year, and these villas are positioned 45% below equivalent Costa Blanca North prices, making them an exceptional investment proposition.

locationSection.intro: El Chaparral is a thriving residential neighborhood in Torrevieja that perfectly balances peaceful suburban living with convenient access to all urban amenities. Located in the southern Costa Blanca, this area has become increasingly popular among both established expat communities and international property investors seeking authentic Spanish Mediterranean living. The neighborhood benefits from Torrevieja's extensive infrastructure, excellent healthcare system, world-renowned golf courses, and stunning beaches. El Chaparral offers a safe, family-friendly environment where English is widely spoken, international schools provide quality education, and a diverse range of restaurants, shops, and services cater to international residents. The area's consistent property appreciation and strong rental market make it an ideal location for both primary residences and investment portfolios.

content.investmentSection: VILLA TEGI represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic property markets. Torrevieja's real estate sector is experiencing consistent growth of 8% year-on-year, driven by strong demand from international buyers, retirees, and investors. These villas are priced at €895,000 from—significantly lower than comparable properties on the northern Costa Blanca, yet with identical quality and amenities. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean home for personal enjoyment, a rental investment, or a retirement property, VILLA TEGI delivers on every front. The combination of DK TILL SPANIEN's quality construction, El Chaparral's convenient location, Torrevieja's welcoming international community, and proven 8% year-on-year market growth makes this an investment you won't find elsewhere on the Costa Blanca.
